## #################################################################
## Generated by dtkPluginGenerator
## #################################################################

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.1)

project(vistalDataImageConverterPlugin)

## #################################################################
## Setup version numbering
## #################################################################

set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR 2 CACHE STRING "${PROJECT_NAME} major version number.")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR 0 CACHE STRING "${PROJECT_NAME} minor version number.")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_BUILD 0 CACHE STRING "${PROJECT_NAME} build version number.")
set(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION
  "${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR}.${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR}.${${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_BUILD}")

mark_as_advanced(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MAJOR)
mark_as_advanced(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_MINOR)
mark_as_advanced(${PROJECT_NAME}_VERSION_BUILD)

set(CMAKE_COLOR_MAKEFILE ON)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE OFF)
set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR TRUE)

## #################################################################
## Resolve dependencies
## #################################################################

find_package(dtk REQUIRED)

include(${dtk_USE_FILE})
include(dtkPlugin)

find_package(Vistal REQUIRED)
find_package(ITK REQUIRED)
include(${VISTAL_USE_FILE})

include_directories(${BOOST_INCLUDE_DIR})

## #################################################################
## Input
## #################################################################

set(${PROJECT_NAME}_HEADERS_MOC
  vistalDataImageConverterPlugin.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageDouble3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageFloat3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageInt3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUInt3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUShort3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageShort3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageChar3Converter.h
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUChar3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUChar3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageChar3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUShort3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageShort3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUInt3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageInt3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageFloat3Converter.h
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageDouble3Converter.h
vistalToVistalChar3Converter.h
vistalToVistalDouble3Converter.h
vistalToVistalFloat3Converter.h
vistalToVistalInt3Converter.h
vistalToVistalShort3Converter.h
vistalToVistalUChar3Converter.h
vistalToVistalUInt3Converter.h
vistalToVistalUShort3Converter.h
)

set(${PROJECT_NAME}_SOURCES
  vistalDataImageConverterPlugin.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageDouble3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageFloat3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageInt3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUInt3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUShort3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageShort3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageChar3Converter.cpp
  vistalDataImageToItkDataImageUChar3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUChar3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageChar3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUShort3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageShort3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageUInt3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageInt3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageFloat3Converter.cpp
  itkDataImageToVistalDataImageDouble3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalChar3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalDouble3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalFloat3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalInt3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalShort3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalUChar3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalUInt3Converter.cpp
vistalToVistalUShort3Converter.cpp
  VistalConverters.cpp
)

## #################################################################
## Build rules
## #################################################################

qt4_wrap_cpp(${PROJECT_NAME}_SOURCES_MOC ${${PROJECT_NAME}_HEADERS_MOC})

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} SHARED
  ${${PROJECT_NAME}_SOURCES_MOC}
  ${${PROJECT_NAME}_SOURCES})

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}
  ${QT_LIBRARIES}
  ${VISTAL_LIBS}
  ${ITK_LIBRARIES}
  dtkCore)

dtk_build_doc(vistalDataImageConverterPlugin)


# Testing app

add_executable(${PROJECT_NAME}Testing
  vistalDataImageConverterTestingApp.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(${PROJECT_NAME}Testing
 ${QT_LIBRARIES}
  ${MSTOOLS_LIB}
  ${VISTAL_LIBS}
  dtkCore
  )


## #################################################################
## Install rules
## #################################################################

install(TARGETS ${PROJECT_NAME}
  RUNTIME DESTINATION plugins
  LIBRARY DESTINATION plugins
  ARCHIVE DESTINATION plugins)
